message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a fair split.
I appreciate the offer, but I think a 60-40 split in my favor is more equitable. Let's see if you agree.
I'm willing to compromise, 58-42 is the best I can do for now.
I'm willing to stick with my previous offer. I believe it's a fair compromise, and the decreasing value of the money makes it even more important to reach an agreement quickly.
I'm still not willing to give up the majority, but I'm willing to compromise a bit more. Let's meet in the middle.
